content: **knitted cover for hot-water bottle in drops fabel and drops melody piece is knitted bottom up in stocking stitch theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #shimmeringsnowcover drops design pattern fa-568 yarn group a + d ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** the cover fits a hot-water bottle that is approx 32 cm long and approx 19 cm wide **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 924 confetti cake and use drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 50 g colour 01 off white **needles** drops circular needle size 6 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm **knitting gauge** 14 stitches in width and 17 row vertically in stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality needle size 6 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
